core.​ XPS_typ_HashmapObjectTypeRestrictor
core.​XPS_ifc_ITypeRestrictor
core.​XPS_typ_HashmapObjectTypeRestrictor

TypeDefinition

createhashmapobject [XPS_typ_HashmapObjectTypeRestrictor, _allowedTypes]
Authors

CrashDome

Description

Provides a Hashmap Object Type checker

Parameters
_allowedTypes (optional)

Array - of Hashmap Object Types in string format (e.g. ["XPS_typ_Blackboard"] )

Returns

HashmapObject

Reserved
#create
call ["#create", _allowedTypes]
Parameters
_allowedTypes (optional)

Array - of Hashmap Object Types in string format (e.g. ["XPS_typ_Blackboard"] )

Returns

True

#str
"XPS_typ_HashmapObjectTypeRestrictor"
@interfaces

XPS_ifc_ITypeRestrictor

Methods
RegisterType
call ["RegisterType",_value]

XPS_ifc_ITypeRestrictor

Does nothing for this class. Simply Satisfies Interface

Parameters
_value

String - a HashmapObject Type ("#type") to add to allowed list

Returns
True

if successfully registered

False

type already exists

Throws
XPS_typ_ArgumentNilException

if parameter was nil

IsAllowed
call ["IsAllowed",_value]

XPS_ifc_ITypeRestrictor

Parameters
_value

HashmapObject - Value to check to see if it is allowed to be added
